creator: gp.ciceri@acm.org
text:
Hello all, it seems that there is a path issue trying to use the fallback to
customize the authoring login page.

If I put 
<map:transform src="{fallback:lenya/xslt/ac/login.xsl}">
in webapp/lenya/sitemap.xmap I'm not able to use pubs fallbacks, only
the core one.

If I use 
<map:transform src="{fallback:xslt/ac/login.xsl}">
I'm able to use pubs fallbacks only moving their path one level higher
(from webapps/lenya/lenya/pubs to webapps/lenya/pubs), 
but in this case the core fallback doesn't work anymore.


BTW, I'm not able to find a DEBUG setting that helps me 
looking what file is called.

/gp

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: Added lenya-dev@cocoon.apache.org to CC list of this entry.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The correct syntax is
<map:transform src="lenya/{fallback:xslt/ac/login.xsl}">

I fixed it in CVS.
